name: Spoilers breaker
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.reddit.com"), domain("reddit.com") {

a[href|="/spoiler"]:nth-of-type(n), a[href|="#spoiler"]:nth-of-type(n), a[href|="/s"]:nth-of-type(n) { font-size: 18px; font-variant: small-caps !important; cursor: text !important; color: #72b4ff !important; background-color: #18113b !important } }
